titleStmt.title: Bibliotheca theologica: or, a librarye theological containinge, 1. A generall analysis or resolution: 2. A breife elucidation off the most sacred chapters off Elohim his Bible: drawen for the vse of yonge Christians, specially off the poorer sorte, vnable to purchase variety off holy-men theyr wrytinges: by Henoch Clapham. Nihil primum perfectum.
titleStmt.author: Clapham, Henoch.

notesStmt.note: Apparently the study was interrupted at the close of Genesis. Possibly this is the first draft of Clapham's Antidoton--Folger Shakespeare Library Catalogue.
The title page ornament is identical to that in 6281, 12340. Other items from the same press are 5337, 5345, 5346 and 6280.5--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
